name: My! Post!
description:
MY!! Post!

The post office is overstaffed, the only way to get paid is by competing to deliver packages.

MY!! Post! is a quick multiplayer party game where the aim is to get the packages to the the front door of the house, whilst getting past all of the obstacles and invading other players.

This is a small prototype we have made in less than 2 weeks, please give it a go and tell us what you think about it.

Controls:

Controller (Recommended) 

(A) select/pick up/drop
(B) throw package
(RT) Dash/Nudge

Keyboard

(X) select/pick up/drop
(Z) throw package
(Space) Dash/Nudge

Obstacles will knock you back force you to drop your package, this allows other players to steal it from you and deliver the package. 

To score the player has to be holding the package and walk to the front door of the house to score, at the end of each round players will be given their pay slip based on how many packages they have delivered.
